lenin saha wiplawawadi parajakawadaya thunwani jathyantharaya lesa nawa jathyantharayak goda nagimehi la leninge mulopayika mawatha, yuddhaya awila yamen ikbithiwa pahadili lesa idiripath kerunu“adhirajyawadi yuddhaya siwil yuddhaya bawata harawanu” yana idiri darshanaya thula pindu kota dakwina. 1914 nowambaraye di yuddhaya saha rusiyanu samaja pa්rajathantha්raya yana mayen nikuth kerunu niwedanayakin mese pa්rakasha karana ladi: “warthamana adhirajyawadi yuddhaya siwil yuddhayakata pariwarthanaya kirima yana satan pataya, komiyunaya pawathi samaye sita anugamanaya kerunu ha 1912 basl yojanawa thula genahara dakwu ekama niwaradi nirdhana panthi satan patayayi.
